title: My Petite Factory
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out, French, Fusion, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 100% gluten free cafe where staff reportedly understand veganism. Usually has at least one vegan plate. The menu changes daily according to the seasonal ingredients and it's posted on its facebook, with the vegan choice(s) labeled. Located within walking distance from Hotel de Ville station.
